quote: I would just have to find a hog, slaughter it, butcher it, cure the meat, then fry it up. Thinking about the bacon—the potential of bacon—gives me hope. Not all is lost if bacon isn't. Seriously.
quote_letters: I WOULD JUST HAVE TO FIND A HOG SLAUGHTER IT BUTCHER IT CURE THE MEAT THEN FRY IT UP THINKING ABOUT THE BACON-THE POTENTIAL OF BACON-GIVES ME HOPE NOT ALL IS LOST IF BACON ISNT SERIOUSLY
